output_list.criticism: The mintToken function has an integer overflow in the following code: function mintToken(address target, uint256 mintedAmount) onlyOwner public { balanceOf[target] += mintedAmount; totalSupply += mintedAmount; emit Transfer(0, this, mintedAmount); emit Transfer(this, target, mintedAmount); } The vulnerability arises from the fact that the totalSupply variable is not checked for overflow before being incremented by the mintedAmount. This can lead to an integer overflow, where the totalSupply exceeds the maximum value that can be stored in a uint256 variable. This can result in loss of funds or other unintended consequences.
